t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 2 days ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
